column1: Uchi////It seemed like our waiter was a bit peeved that we didn't order any drinks. Kind of like he was rushing us out. As we were eating dessert
column3: which is fine. What is not fine is to come back to get it while we were still eating. Am I supposed to stop eating and go into my purse and pull out my card? Â He came
column5: did a double take when he saw that nothing was in it
column6: and we said "oh we didn't put anything in it"(b/c we are still freaking eating!!!). Then he put it back on the table and went away. Come on. Let me enjoy my food.
